Hero.title: Oleh Panchenko
Hero.tagline: Cook borsch, write code and never stop exploring.
Hero.summary: Having almost a year coding experience currently I'm working on learning new skills and expanding my technology stack. My goal is to start a career as a software developer in a reputed company where I can use my strengths to deliver good results and grow personally. I'm particularly excited by the possibility of being surrounded by like-minded professionals who strive for development and are simply pleasant people to communicate with.
